fields.label: Flexible Content
fields.name: flexible_content
fields.instructions: The following flexible content fields can be dragged into the order in which you'd like them to display.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: layout
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a Layout

choices.content-left: Content Area on the left, with an image on the right
choices.content-right: Content area on the right, with an image on the left
choices.content-both: A content area on each side

sub_fields.label: Content Column
sub_fields.name: content_column
sub_fields.instructions: Add content, if needed. If you need to title the section, add the title as a h2 element.

sub_fields.label: Second Content Column
sub_fields.name: second_content_column
sub_fields.instructions: Add content, if needed. If you need to title the section, add the title as a h2 element.

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the text colour for this section.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a background colour. NOTE: If you select a background colour, it will override the background image for this section.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: foreground_image
sub_fields.instructions: Select an image.

sub_fields.label: Left Column Content
sub_fields.name: left_column_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add content, if needed. If you need to title the section, add the title as a h2 element.

sub_fields.label: Right Column Content
sub_fields.name: right_column_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add content, if needed. If you need to title the section, add the title as a h2 element.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Select an Image to display as a full width background. Images should be less than 100kB and should be at least 2000 pixels wide to display full-width. If they are not wide enough, they will be centred - which may still be acceptable.

sub_fields.label: Fixed Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want to "fix" the background image? As the user scrolls, different parts of the image will be revealed as the image remains fixed in place.

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the text colour for this section.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a background colour. NOTE: If you select a background colour, it will override the background image for this section.

sub_fields.label: Image Opacity
sub_fields.name: image_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: If needed, you can add opacity to the background image. This will have no effect if you have not selected a background image/colour.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: If required, enter a Title for this section.

sub_fields.label: Text Block
sub_fields.name: text_block
sub_fields.instructions: Add a simple text block.

sub_fields.label: Fixed Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: Fix the image on scroll?

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a text colour for this section

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Pick a background colour, if required.

sub_fields.label: Image Opacity
sub_fields.name: image_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Select an opacity

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: If required, enter a Title for this section.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add a simple text block.

sub_fields.label: Fixed Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: Fix the image on scroll?

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a text colour for this section

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Pick a background colour, if required.

sub_fields.label: Image Opacity
sub_fields.name: image_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Select an opacity

sub_fields.label: Column Width
sub_fields.name: column_width
sub_fields.instructions: Select the column width. It is generally a good idea to ensure that text content is not too wide - this is less readable.

sub_fields.label: Call to Action
sub_fields.name: call_to_action
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want to include a call to action in this section? It will be placed as a button beneath the emphasis text.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.message:
Enter a title and introduction for a services section.
Previews of the service pages will be automatically added to the page.

sub_fields.label: Services Section Title
sub_fields.name: services_title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a title for a Services section.

sub_fields.label: Services Intro
sub_fields.name: services_intro
sub_fields.instructions: Enter an introductory paragraph for the services section.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Background image, if necessary

sub_fields.label: projects
sub_fields.name: projects
sub_fields.instructions: Select projects to be featured on the front page.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a title for the Featured Projects section

sub_fields.label: Introduction
sub_fields.name: introduction
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a brief introduction to this Featured Projects section.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Add a background colour for this section. If you also choose a background image, the image will take precedence.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Select or upload a background image for this section, if required.

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a text colour

sub_fields.label: Fixed Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: Fix the image?

sub_fields.label: Image Option
sub_fields.name: image_option
sub_fields.instructions: If you include an image, choose how you'd like it to display. NOTE: if you want to display an image cropped to a perfect circle, your original image must be a perfect square.

sub_fields.label: Display Option
sub_fields.name: display_option
sub_fields.instructions: Select how you'd like to display testimonials.

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the text colour. Overrides all theme defaults.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Background Image

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Background Colour

sub_fields.label: Fixed Background Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: Fix the background image?

sub_fields.label: Image Opacity
sub_fields.name: image_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Select an image opacity

sub_fields.label: Clients
sub_fields.name: clients
sub_fields.instructions: Enter your client details to display these in a block.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Select or upload the client logo

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Select an Image to display as a full width background. Images should be less than 100kB and should be at least 2000 pixels wide to display full-width. If they are not wide enough, they will be centred - which may still be acceptable.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a subheading for this section, if needed.

sub_fields.label: Text Content
sub_fields.name: text_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add content, if needed.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a background colour. NOTE: If you select a background colour, it will override the background image for this section.

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the text colour for this section.

sub_fields.label: Image Opacity
sub_fields.name: image_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: If needed, you can app opacity (either light or dark) to the background image. Thjs will have no effect if you have not selected a background image.

sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.name: type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of call to action.

sub_fields.label: Fixed Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: Fix the image relative to the page?
